metadata.title: CVE-2023-52790 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:swiotlb: fix out-of-bounds TLB allocations with CONFIG_SWIOTLB_DYNAMICLimit the free list length to the size of the IO TLB. Transient pool can besmaller than IO_TLB_SEGSIZE, but the free list is initialized with theassumption that the total number of slots is a multiple of IO_TLB_SEGSIZE.As a result, swiotlb_area_find_slots() may allocate slots past the end ofa transient IO TLB buffer.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
